definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Harbermas thinks the individual unification and moralses must be combined together.
sentences.chinese: 在哈貝馬斯看來，個體同一性須與道德相結合。

sentences.english: Historical materialism is one of important sources of Jurgen habermas' theory.
sentences.chinese: 哈貝馬斯的理論的一個重要來源是歷史唯物主義。

sentences.english: Publicity is an important concept in Habermas's theory.
sentences.chinese: 公共性是哈貝馬斯交往理論中的重要概念。

sentences.english: This is a point that Habermas has recently conceded.
sentences.chinese: 這一點哈貝馬斯最近承認。
